Name: Beat Biome
About the game: Play music through your headset and Beat Biome will automatically pick it up, reacting to the beats and wavelengths! This is a pretty small trip, but fun none the less. Enjoy several psychedelic environments, even create your own! Just play some music and chill out, maybe lie down or bust a move. It's up to you how to enjoy this, just keep an open mind and two open ears. If this blows up I'll make some more content, but in the meantime leave your comments in a review or email me directly with any bugs/feedback/etc you have. I'm a single developer and just made this for fun, so please be understanding if I can't get to everything. Thanks, and enjoy!
